markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Aromatic Ammunition](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1188)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 168</row>

**Price** 5 gp

<row gap="medium">
**Ammunition** any

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

The components of this ammunition emit a strong smell when combined during its activation. A creature hit by an activated aromatic ammunition gains a distinct odor for up to 1 hour or until the scent is washed off (requiring at least a gallon of water and 10 minutes of scrubbing). Any creatures within 30 feet smell the target, allowing even those with a weak sense of smell to detect its presence, and all creatures gain a +1 item bonus to [Track](/Actions.aspx?ID=66) the affected creature for as long as it has the odor. A creature that has imprecise or precise [scent](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=33) doubles the range at which they can detect the target using their scent compared to the normal range of their scent.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Aromatic Ammunition
